name: Playback (RobertW)
description:
Made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2
*Music and SFX used are not made by me* Game Info:

Solve puzzles with the unique ability to rewind your time!

Controls:

(Also shown in game)

  • ←↓→ / ASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • R (Hold) - Rewind your time
  • Backspace - Reset to checkpoint

Thanks for playing :)

Play some of the other games from the Jam: https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-4/entries
